title: PMS 2.0 306 - Week 13 NFL Preview, Josh Allen, David Bakhtiari, Ariel Helwani, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about his upcoming match on Sunday at WarGames and dive into some of the things they are looking forward to this weekend. Also joining the show is the #7 overall pick in the 2018 NFL Draft, Quarterback for the Buffalo Bills, Josh Allen. Pat and Josh chat about him getting better each year so far in his NFL career, seizing the opportunity in the AFC East right now, his thoughts about the Bills team and what he's had to do to improve his play, and much more (15:26-40:06). Next, 4x All-Pro, 2x Pro Bowler, the owner of a new $100 million contract, Packers Tackle, David Bakhtiari joins the program to chat about whether or not he's going to get Aaron a gift for Christmas, if his contract was negotiated differently due to Covid, if playing tackle is a lot like playing chess, his film watching habits, and he talks about how he had the grit and toughness ingrained in him from his father (41:27-1:00:55). Later, ESPN MMA Insider Ariel Helwani joins the program to chat about joining the pre-show panel for WarGames this weekend and spins into a wild segment featuring Booker T and Daniel Cormier where all hell breaks loose (1:00:57-1:24:34). Lastly, Pat and AJ Hawk go through the games this weekend and make their picks (1:24:36-1:43:30). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
